task.title: Insert The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: After all necessary repairs and replacements have been made, follow these steps to insert the platen roller back into the typewriter.

step.cmd: Line the left end of the platen roller up with the platen detent shaft.
Slide the platen roller onto the detent shaft while pushing the platen roller down until it is set in place.
Push the platen detent arm inwards, towards the platen to lock it into place.
